# SelfCI

SelfCI is a minimalistic local-first Unix-philosophy-abiding CI.

# Check it on Radicle

This project is primarily hosted on Radicle, and Github repository
is just a mirror to help discoverability. Check-out [SelfCI on Radicle](https://app.radicle.xyz/nodes/radicle.dpc.pw/rad:z2tDzYbAXxTQEKTGFVwiJPajkbeDU) for an up to date version.

Continue to [the original SelfCI README.md](../README.md).
